# VEHICLE::SET_VEHICLE_REDUCE_GRIP_LEVEL

## Summary
Sets the grip level to use, from 0 to 3, when the above function SET_VEHICLE_REDUCE_GRIP is called

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicleIndex
* **INT** reducedGripLevel

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
val is 0-3
Often used in conjunction with: SET_VEHICLE_REDUCE_GRIP
